sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-layout row warp justify-center>
      <v-flex xs8 md6 >
        <v-card class="mx-lg-auto mx-auto rounded-lg"  elevation="20"  :loading="isload" >
          <v-app-bar class="mb-5" color="teal lighten-3" dark prominent scroll-target="#scrolling-techniques-4">
            <v-toolbar-title>Login</v-toolbar-title>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          </v-app-bar>
          <v-text-field label="账号" 
            v-model="username"
            outlined class="px-5" 
            clearable required 
            hint="Required"
            :rules="rules.name" 
            prepend-icon="mdi-account"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field label="密码" 
            v-model="password"
            outlined class="px-5" 
            clearable required 
            :rules="rules.name" 
            hint="Required"
            prepend-icon="mdi-onepassword"
            :type="show2 ? 'text' : 'password'"
            @click:append="show2 = !show2"
            :append-icon="show2 ? 'mdi-eye' : 'mdi-eye-off'"
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn block depressed large 
              elevation="10" 
              class="blue white--text" 
              @click="login" :loading="isload"
              :disabled='isload'
              >登录</v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-card-text block class="grey--text text-center">
              <router-link to="/signup">忘记密码了?</router-link>
            </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-flex>
  </v-layout>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data(){
    return{
      username:"",
      password:"",
      show1: true,
      show2: false,
      isload:false,
      rules: {
          name: [val => (val || '').length > 0 || 'This field is required'],
        },
    }
  },
  methods:{
    login(){
        this.isload = true
        console.log(this.isload)
        this.$http.post('http://localhost:3000/users/login',{
                "username":this.username,
                "password":this.password,
                _timeout:1000
        }).then(res=> {
            this.isload = false
            console.log(res.data.user);
            console.log(res.data.token);
            window.sessionStorage.setItem("currenttoken",res.data.token);
            this.$router.push({path:'/supremeuser'})
        })
        .catch(err => {
          console.log(err.status)
          this.username = ''
          this.password = ''
          this.isload = false
        })
    },
  }
}
</script>
